programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL an unruly detainee is sent to isolation, twice. In Multnomah county a young man feverishly waits for his release. In Portland, OR a man is jailed for bitting his girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman who was nabbed for jaywalking claims the police were out of line for arresting her. A woman is brought in on domestic-violence charges, and a drug peddler claims he's selling to support his addiction to poker.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A hysterical woman is transferred to an isolation cell. A woman shows her undying LA pride to the arresting officers. A young woman is put under observation for threatening harm to herself.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man attempts to eat marijuana in jail. The Special Detention Unit investigates forbidden letters hidden amongst inmates. A bloody, vicious brawl escalates between an imprisoned duo.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An eccentric jail regular is welcomed back. Man fleeing Mexico details the horrors he escaped. Young woman describes her lucrative fling as a stripper. A woman finds that trying to drink away a bad boyfriend and then asking the boyfriend for bail money is not a good idea. A man collapses during booking after being arrested for drunk driving. Officers have heart to heart with a depressed inmate going through a breakup with a cheating girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A passenger allegedly attacked a cabdriver. A woman describes assaulting her boyfriend with hot food, and a mother is arrested for leaving her kids in a car while gambling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate claims to be the victim of an internet scam which led to his arrest. Officers take it easy on a rowdy inmate struggling through a spiritual crisis. Years of prison time can’t sway a young gang affiliate from changing his ways. Prisoners cause plumbing problems to send a message. A mother and daughter bond over being locked up together.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL officers place a hostile former Marine in isolation. In Portland, OR officers take a man into custody for joyriding in a stolen car. In Las Vegas, NV a jailed man is more concerned about the condition of his car rather than the people involved in the accident that was hospitalized.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An aspiring martial-arts fighter tries to wriggle out of handcuffs and gets stuck. A football rivalry takes a bad turn when a Steelers fan assaults a Ravens fan.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: The night of the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight a woman pummels a nightclub security guard for an unusual reason. A man who claims to have served in the military confronts a Lieutenant and threatens fellow detainees in the holding cell. A “Pac-man” fan has a spat with his Mayweather-backing wife.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cell brawl escalates quickly. After being arrested on her wedding night, a woman has deep regrets and serious reflection. Officers free a man from his own noose and place him on a vigilant watch.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers have difficulty booking an incomprehensible man. A commotion at a church ends in arrest. A man wearing a tuxedo is detained after mocking officers for wearing “pig suits.”

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man is charged with possession of an illegal substance. Police arrest a woman for narcotics, and a couple is caught passing a fake prescription.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman fights arrest resulting in a trip to the isolation chamber. One inmate calls 911 within jail walls causing confusion. Later, officers run to the rescue when a man passes out.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers outwit a man who refuses to give his name. A repeat DUI offender is jailed yet again. An intoxicated man is taken into custody and once the alcohol wears off he reveals that he’s broken his sobriety.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman tries to conceal illegal substances in her bra. Bandmates are charged for tresspassing, and two inmates are separated and placed in restraints after losing control.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman finds herself in jail after telling police she was frightened by a monkey mask. An intoxicate man feels an officer is very special. During a search, an officer finds contraband in a pack of cigarettes that has big consequences to an inmate. A young man says his mom tried to pepper spray him over his brother’s drug use while officers discover the truth to his arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV an intoxicated man is placed in isolation after exhibiting combative behavior. In Portland, OR a man wearing a red dress is brought in for trespassing and tells officers that he is in the FBI. In Reno, NV two young men are set straight after stealing a car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Needles are found on one woman while a stun gun is discovered on another. A DUI test stirs up bad memories for a man driving while intoxicated, and a convicted murderer becomes violent.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A homeless man punches a singing transient over a racist comment. An assailant hits a sleeping man with a brick over a money dispute. A sobbing young man insists he was falsely arrested. A bar fight sends a UFC fighter to the hospital and the bartender who slugged him to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in women's lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought in for attacking her boyfriend. A talkative inmate is moved to isolation, and an daring inmate attempts to escape his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Three inmates start brawling inside the drunk tank. One man must wear a mask so that officers can avoid his rain of spit. A young woman fails to take jail seriously and behaves provocatively.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A combative man is placed in a side cell. A transgender woman shares her story. A wild driver is placed in custody, and an intoxicated man is arrested for assault.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is placed in isolation after disparaging other inmates. Alarms blare while a fight erupts in the shower room among inmates. A man booked into jail is revealed to have a 20-year arrest record.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A couple is taken into custody for lewd and indecent exposure. An intoxicated woman believes that she is being treated unfairly, and a man with an existing wrap sheet is busted.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman who was nabbed for jaywalking claims the police were out of line for arresting her. A woman is brought in on domestic-violence charges, and a drug peddler claims he's selling to support his addiction to poker.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Headbutts and aggression abound during a jail fight. A young man is arrested after stealing $1,500 worth of hats. Officers discover a suicidal inmate who’s no longer taking his medication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate swallows a stash of drugs and then comes down with a case of the munchies. A 72-year-old offers an unusual excuse for dealing drugs to teens at a mall, and a woman charged with assaulting a landlord fakes being sick to get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: One man booked for intoxication is placed in a sobering cell for being uncooperative. An aggrieved woman claims Animal Control took her “baby.” A man tells officers he is a “child of God” and actor.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A disorderly man shouts to the heavens and asks for divine intervention. Twin brothers are arrested after a fray with police. A man in women’s clothing is booked after harassing passengers on a bus.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers have difficulty booking an incomprehensible man. A commotion at a church ends in arrest. A man wearing a tuxedo is detained after mocking officers for wearing “pig suits.”

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After cutting her head, a woman bites and kicks deputies. To investigate potential hidden meanings, a man’s tattoos are examined. A confused man is found with illegal mushrooms at a bus stop.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman gives officers a hard time in booking when she refuses to comply. A catwoman is arrested for hitting her date at a club, and a pusherman discusses his contributions to the economy.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man in detention is paranoid about officers handling him inappropriately. A man in custody claims to have a seizure. A man is taken in to custody for stealing videogaming equipment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate becomes aggressive during a routine pat down. A confused senior citizen thinks the detention center is the site of a poetry slam, and two girlfriends come to blows while gambling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: One man booked for intoxication is placed in a sobering cell for being uncooperative. An aggrieved woman claims Animal Control took her “baby.” A man tells officers he is a “child of God” and actor.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR a man in custody accuses officers of being involved in the 1992 event at Ruby Ridge. In Sarasota, FL a drunk man falls off his bike and purports to have been hit by a car. In Las Vegas, LV a daring inmate attempts to make a break for it while the supervising officers attend to a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT an inebriated man gets aggressive and questions why he's in custody. In Sarasota, FL a couple are taken in for assaulting a bartender. In Portland, OR a man is placed in custody for harassing movie theater security guards. In Las Vegas, NV a chauffeur is placed in custody for amassing a number of of moving violations.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A hysterical woman is transferred to an isolation cell. A woman shows her undying LA pride to the arresting officers. A young woman is put under observation for threatening harm to herself.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man is arrested at a popular theme park for public intoxication. A detainee swallows his earring during processing. Officers attempt to restrain a combative woman in custody.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A testy man is sent to the isolation cell to "cool off." A teary-eyed young man maintains his innocence. An inmate may have ingested contraband to avoid possession charges.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers struggle with an angry man after he kicks out a patrol car window. A relationship ends when a woman takes a bite out of her boyfriend. An upset wife stabs her husband and he ends up in handcuffs. A woman is happy to celebrate her birthday by going to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested on drug warrants is upset about the BBQ brisket he left on the grill. An intoxicated ladies' man flirts with the jail staff and an inmate finds it funny that he sold tree leaves as pot to an undercover officer. Brother turns on brother when a good deed gets mixed with alcohol. A man caught panhandling believes officers should arrest hardened criminals instead of him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Toting his guitar, an inmate serenades the officers. One man protests his arrest and states that having cocaine is not a crime. A man claims to be an Iraqi War Veteran and challenges his detainment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Tempers flare up when two agitated inmates share a cell. An intoxicated woman gives officers a hard time in booking, and a hustler facing DUI charges wants to change his ways.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man claims to be connected to the occupy Wall Street movement. Officers struggle with a combative man, and a tearful candy thief is taken into custody.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative inmate complicates things. A man charged with DUI complains about the prison food. A security guard arrested for robbery fears that her dream job with Homeland Security is gone.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: We follow the men and women of LVMPD as they do their best to tame the New Year's Eve festivities up and down the Las Vegas Strip.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate interrupts the booking process. A couple is brought in after signs of a domestic dispute but claim they were being intimate, and a jailed woman shares some of her Webcam exploits.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate's flirting calms a jailhouse fight. An inebriated man tries to avoid his eighth DUI by claiming his car was stolen, and a disagreement over Faecbook puts a couple in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.
